pages.text: 這是一個$(l:programming/conditions)條件/$拼圖。$(p)$(thing)條件：實體/$允許對指定$(l:programming/area)區域/$內的實體計數。被計數的實體可以通過可選的作為$(l:base_concepts/entity_filter)實體過濾器/$的$(l:programming/text)文字/$過濾。

Keep in mind that any $(l:programming/area)Area/$ widgets connected to this widget must have an area type of $(thing)Box/$; this is the only supported shape. It's possible to create different shapes, though, by using whitelisting/blacklisting of areas.
